name: 黃希敏
objective: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
schedule:
01	 “The Apprentice” Ep. 7: It's More than Decor	 
02	 HOLIDAY 
03	 Skit 1
04	 “The Apprentice” Ep. 8: A Slice of Heaven
05	 Skit 2
06	 “The Apprentice” Ep. 9: Assault on Battery
07	 HOLIDAY 
09	 Midterm (1)
10	 Midterm (2)	  
11	 “The Apprentice” Ep. 10: Blow Out 
12	 Skit 3 
13	 “The Apprentice” Ep. 11: Back to School 
14	 Skit 4  
15	 “The Apprentice” Ep. 12: Backs Against the Wal-Mart 
16	 Skit 5 
17	 Final (1)
18	 Final (2)
scorePolicy:
1. Group discussions and oral reports   25%
2. Skits                                25%
3. Midterm + Final (Individual Talk)    50%
4. Spontaneous Q & A                    bonus credits
materials:
1. The US reality show:“The Apprentice”video [Season 5]
2. Handouts provided by the instructor
3. American colloquialisms [美國人這樣說(書林)]
